     142             : /**
     143             :  * Implementation of an editor object.  it will be the controller/focal point
     144             :  * for the main editor services. i.e. the GUIManager, publishing, transaction
     145             :  * manager, event interfaces. the idea for the event interfaces is to have them
     146             :  * delegate the actual commands to the editor independent of the XPFE
     147             :  * implementation.
